name: Good news!
description:
How have you been sharing good news remotely?


— Backstory

I had the privilege of sharing some good news with a couple designers on my team a few months back.


As I prepped for the calls, I reflected on my first promo facilitated by my manager Aaron Martin. He handed me a nicely sealed Y! envelope to open and read. It was simple and impactful.


It's not as easy now to create that experience like Aaron did, but I think we can get close. For my crew I created the digital version: an envelope prototype.


It seemed like a hit so I turned it into a free resource on Figma. It’s easy to customize and share. Give it a try next time you have good news.
